long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Provides you with an guerrilla email address, which will completely disappear in 45 minutes. You can use it for all that annoying situations when someone is asking you to provide your email, so you can get access to free stuff.

Works well for registrations and so on.
It's not able to handle attachments, so not a fit for that kind of situation.
